list_page_teaser: These politicians have written books that I have read and used to create images of their personalities.  Click to learn more!
description_html:
This gallery contains images of the personalities of established and up-and-coming politicians who have written at least one book.

The books are autobiographical in nature, and most of them are memoirs. All of them are personal accounts that give the reader a good sense of who the author is.

This gallery is a work in progress.

Check back for updates in a few days or weeks.

Thanks for your patience!

image_list.title: Donald Trump Jr.
image_list.gallery_page_teaser: Donald Trump Jr.'s spiritual portrait shows he is ______________.  Click on the image to learn more!
image_list.explain_dom: The Green in this spiritual portrait represents X's dominant personality trait, Thinking: objectivity; rationality; cool-headedness; very slight/moderate/strong preference for logic/reason/objectivity over emotion/empathy/subjectivity; their very slight/moderate/strong preference for the logical/rational/impersonal/objective over the emotional/irrrational/personal/subjective.

The Green in X's spiritual portrait represents their dominant personality trait, their very slight/moderate/strong preference for making logical/rational/impersonal/objective rather than emotional/irrrational/personal/subjective decisions; their very slight/moderate/strong preference for being/tendency to be logical/rational/impersonal/objective rather than emotional/irrrational/personal/subjective.
image_list.explain_dom_constant: In Extraverts, the dominant trait is directed outwardly, and spiritual portraits use a long vertical line to represent this, because it is the side of their personality that is most evident.  He/She demonstrates/exhibits this trait in their (note that is easier to find examples of decisions than perceptions!) ....
image_list.explain_dom_very_slight_preference: It's important to note this preference/tendency is very slight, and X can be quite _____ in some situations/when the situation calls for it.
image_list.explain_aux: The Yellow in this spiritual portrait represents X's auxiliary personality trait, Sensing: pragmatism; pragmatic; practical; realism; realistic; outlook; openness to new experiences; very slight/moderate/strong preference for facts over ideas.

The Yellow in X's spiritual portrait represents their auxiliary personality trait, their very slight/moderate/strong preference for seeing the/tendency to see the world more in terms of facts rather than of ideas; need for sensual stimulation.
image_list.explain_aux_constant: In Extraverts, the auxiliary trait is directed inwardly, and spiritual portraits use a horizontal line to represent this.  He/She demonstrates/exhibits this trait in their (note that is easier to find examples of decisions than perceptions!) ....
image_list.explain_aux_very_slight_preference: It's important to note this preference is very slight, and X can be quite _____ in some situations/when the situation calls for it.
image_list.story_html: This spiritual portrait is based on _______.
